node.display_long_description:
WE MAKE FITNESS FUN. With over 100 workout options and regular updates, HOLOFIT makes sure your cardio workouts are interactive, motivating, and fun! 

Run, cycle, or row in 11 amazing worlds, use one of HIIT, Fat burn, or Time-attack programs, compete with other members of the community, and spend up to 400 calories in one session.

What do I need for HOLOFIT? 
- Monthly/ Yearly Membership 
- Optional: Compatible fitness machine. 
Start your 7-day free trial today:  https://www.holodia.com/consumer/ 

Work out in Paris, Antarctica, Babylon, Snowy Mountains, Tropical, Saturn, Aiguebelette, Cambridge, San Francisco, Underwater, and the amazing world of Troglodytes! Measure calorie-burn, save your workout data and progress in our Android/iOS companion app.

Use your bodyweight for rowing, running or cycling exercises, or connect HOLOFIT to your bike, rower, or elliptical to completely transform your workouts. HOLOFIT works on most bikes, rowers, and ellipticals.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
New Graphical Upgrades
We‚Äôve upgraded many graphical assets and also corrected lots of the visual glitches you helped identify! Here is just a small part of the upgrades: 
* Antarctica for Bikes: The floor previously partially submerged has been re-done
* Skiing in San Francisco & Cambridge: Your competitors will now also be skiers instead of cyclists or rowers
* Eagle in San Francisco: The bug with the eagle trophy is now fixed 
* Compression improvements: Big textures have been compressed to reduce the memory used, thus reducing the risk of crashes
* Troglodyte & Babylon: A number of visual glitches have been fixed

Bug Fixes
As usual, a number of bugs have been corrected in this version. We have improved:
* compatibility and connectivity of power bikes, 
* speed estimate on simple rowing machines should now be more precise, and 
* a number of backend improvements that will make your overall user experience smoother!

nodes.title: Have You Tried Skiing on HOLOFIT? Here is a 3-Day Skiing Workout Challenge You Must Try
nodes.body_text:
The summer is here and the days are super-hot, and an escape to a skiing destination would really do you well! And not just that-you‚Äôll lose up to 400 calories per session and kick-start your body into summer shape üòä

Day 1
Launch HOLOFIT, select Freestyle/Skiing and Explore mode. Enjoy the Snowy Mountains environment, do a 20-minute relaxed workout, try and collect all the trophies and warm up your muscles for a day to follow.

Day 2
Test your cardio in HOLOFIT HIIT! Select HOLOFIT Freestyle/Skiing and then select CardioGoals/15-minute HIIT program. We‚Äôll leave it to you to select the difficulty level. Follow the effort curve and try to get your score above 85%. Your muscles will thank you for it üòä

Day 3
Try and see if you can do a better result than on day 1: head to HOLOFIT Freestyle/Skiing and this time jump into the Antarctica world and warm up at your own pace for 10 minutes. See how many trophies you can catch, and after finishing that one, jump into the magical world of Troglodytes. Take a full round through the whole world, and discover some of the exciting surprises in the magic mushroom and exploding turtles worlds. Sounds like fun?

Remember: we provide the motivation and fun, but you have to do the work! The further down you go in squat and the more your arms work, the faster you‚Äôll go.

You‚Äôll see first results after these 3 days, and after you subscribe we‚Äôll make sure you get motivating workouts every single day.

Try it today!

nodes.title: HOLOFIT Update: Grand Sablon Desert Version 2 is Here! üåé
nodes.body_text:
Hey HOLOFITTERS,

It‚Äôs time for another HOLOFIT Go update! Here‚Äôs what we‚Äôve done -

Grand Sablon Desert V2: 10km/6.2mi Added to Explore, with 32 Trophies in Total
The Grand Sablon world is based on the longest foot race on Earth ‚Äì a six-day, 251 km (156 mi) ultramarathon through the Sahara desert. With the addition of 10km, the Grand Sablon desert is now 17 km (over 10 miles) long making it the perfect environment for endurance workouts.

We‚Äôve also added new trophies to the world, 32 in total. How many can you collect?

New Graphical Upgrades
We‚Äôve upgraded many graphical assets and also corrected lots of the visual glitches you helped identify! Here is just a small part of the upgrades:

- Antarctica for Bikes: The floor previously partially submerged has been re-done
- Skiing in San Francisco & Cambridge: Your competitors will now also be skiers instead of cyclists or rowers
- Eagle in San Francisco: The bug with the eagle trophy is now fixed
- Compression improvements: Big textures have been compressed to reduce the memory used, thus reducing the risk of crashes
- Troglodyte & Babylon: A number of visual glitches have been fixed

Bug Fixes
As usual, a number of bugs have been corrected in this version. We have improved:
- compatibility and connectivity of power bikes,
- speed estimate on simple rowing machines should now be more precise, and
- a number of backend improvements that will make your overall user experience smoother!

What‚Äôs Next
Team Holodia will be very busy this summer working on some very important projects that will significantly improve your HOLOFIT experience. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs coming -

- Companion app upgrades: A full overhaul and redesign of our companion app. New integrations with third-party apps - Strava, Apple Health, Google Health. New social features.

- UI redesign: Full redesign of the HOLOFIT VR app, and the user experience. New onboarding, new Profile page, new Home page.
 
- Freestyle Combo workouts: Huge upgrade of HOLOFIT Freestyle. New movements to target different areas of the body that will pop up as short tasks as you travel through our worlds. Spend up to 400 calories in one single session with this super fun new Freestyle workout!

- Interactive Trophies V2: New, interactive trophies that will push you to workout harder: complete certain gameplay to collect them. Fitness reinvented!

- Cyberpunk: We‚Äôre not sure who‚Äôs looking forward to Cyberpunk more - you or us! But either way, we will use the summer months to work on it and can‚Äôt wait to release it.

That would be all for this update. If you have any questions, don‚Äôt hesitate to email us! Looking forward to hearing your feedback.

New updates coming soon!

node.reviewDescription: This is a great way to stay fit. Beautiful environments and fun, but I can't justify the cost of a gym membership on this one app. That seems to be the model for fitness apps, but there are plenty of one-time pay apps that have heavy physical requirements so you can get your fitness fix without regular membership payments (Beat Saber anyone?). To the developers, consider other payment models please. Possibly look at the Beat Saber model - charge for different modules the way they charge for new songs. I'll play the free stuff until then. It is fun, thought.
